name: contentful-knowledge-connector
description: Advanced Contentful integration for Cognigy.AI. Features 4 Tag-based Knowledge Connectors for hierarchical imports, LLM Semantic Chunking, and robust Flow Nodes with Caching & Retries.

scripts.zip: npm run build && tar -zcf contentful-knowledge-connector.tar.gz build/ connections/ knowledge/ nodes/ module.ts package.json package-lock.json README.md icon.png tsconfig.json tslint.json biome.json

author: TDC Erhverv
